pages.text: You may have noticed that you pick up items when walking over a conveyor-belt.$(br2)You can solve the problem by powering the extractor with a redstone signal.

pages.title: Power the extractor
pages.text: To enable magnetic-mode, power the extractor with a redstone signal (lever).$(br)This makes the items magnetic.
Items are magnetic until they gone through an unpowered Puller or OPI, or have entered a machine or inventory.$(br)To get rid of unremovable items, just put a Destructor in front of them.

pages.title: Destructor
pages.text: Removes every item that touches it.
